raw_text: SHAMAL PREETHIE COORAY (nee BANDARATILLEKE) – Wife of Salilanath (Nath) Cooray (US Embassy London),​ much loved mother of Rukshan & Serena,​ sister of Niranjan,​ Malith,​ Roshanara Jobsz,​ Asho,​ Kumar,​ Kumarie Jenkins,​ mother-in-law of Sean Hilllier,​ adored grandma of Mia,​ passed away peacefully in United Kingdom. Service at Sudbury Baptist Church (UK) at 12.00 noon on July 11th,​ Cremation at Ruislip Crematorium (UK) at 2.00 p.m.042306

SILVA – W.T.D. – (Former principal Devananda College,​ Ambalangoda and former teacher Dharmasoka College,​ Ambalangoda) – Loving husband of Badra de Silva (former teacher Sangamitta College and Southlands College,​ Galle),​ beloved father of Tharanga (USA),​ Kanchana (USA) and Avanti (USA). Cortege leaves No. 19/​24,​ Kalgewatta,​ Udugama Road,​ Makuluwa,​ Galle at 4 p.m. on Tuesday,​ 11th July. Cremation at Dadalla General Cemetery,​ Galle at 5 p.m.042307
